name: Brandon Nolan
bio: I am a Full Stack Engineer and Graphic Designer with expertise in developing in both Front-End and Back-End development with a passion for creating web applications that are user-friendly and efficient. I have a srong focus on user experience and meeting business needs, and i strive to deliver fast and productive solutions. I enjoy working on projects that challenge me to learn new technologies and problem-solving skills
role: Front-end and Back-end development for the user (customer) side, development of the project's architecture, UX/UI experience enhancement, managing micro-user interactions, integration of project technologies.

name: Ilya Tsoy
bio: I'm a programmer on the hunt for a new job. When I'm not writing code, you can usually find me trying to explain what I do to my parents, petting my cat for inspiration, or arguing with my keyboard. If you're in need of a witty and slightly delirious developer to join your team, look no further - I'm your coding superhero!
role: Front-end and Back-end development for the admin (restaurant) side, development of the process of creating products and categories, dashboard of restaurant, UI process for admin, managing, integration of project technologies.
